definition: variant of 表盤|表盘[biao3 pan2]/watch face
exterior surface/family relationship via females/to show (one's opinion)/a model/a table (listing information)/a form/a meter (measuring sth)

plate/dish/tray/board/hard drive (computing)/to build/to coil/to check/to examine/to transfer (property)/to make over/classifier for food: dish, helping/to coil/classifier for coils of wire/classifier for games of chess

sentences.english: There is the unique Christian Audigier logo displayed on the dial.
sentences.chinese: 有独特的基督教奥迪吉耶在表盘上显示的标志。

sentences.english: And suddenly you look at the gas mileage on the car on the dashboard.
sentences.chinese: 突然你看到汽车仪表盘上的油耗情况。

sentences.english: It's something where there is a really heavy thing based at one corner, and there's a lot of dials and gauges and everything.
sentences.chinese: 它是有一个角的蛮沉的东西，而且有很多仪表和表盘。

sentences.english: In the college, I alleged that I recollected the dialog in dialect about the dial collection.
sentences.chinese: 在学院，我声称我关于表盘收集用方言回忆对话。

sentences.english: Silver dials are then rhodium or even fine silver to prevent tarnishing.
sentences.chinese: 银色表盘铑甚至是精细的银，以防止变色。

sentences.english: He sneezed a wad of snot onto the dash.
sentences.chinese: 一个喷嚏，他的鼻涕喷到仪表盘上。

sentences.english: The dashboard has just a speedometer and two simple gauges for fuel and mileage.
sentences.chinese: 汽车仪表盘上只有一个车速计及油量和里程表。

sentences.english: The opaline silver dial is very pure and classic.
sentences.chinese: 蛋白银色表盘非常纯净和经典。

sentences.english: The blued minute hand in the centre dominates the clear dial.
sentences.chinese: 蓝色的分针被置于表盘的中央。

sentences.english: At the center of the dial is a piece of smoky glass.
sentences.chinese: 表盘的中央是一块烟灰色的玻璃。

sentences.english: Natural black Mother-of-Pearl dial with hour markers.
sentences.chinese: 天然的黑色母贝表盘与小时刻度。

sentences.english: Brown multilayer dial with gold-tone hands and markers.
sentences.chinese: 布朗多层表盘上带有金色调的手和标记。

sentences.english: Bob turns to the dashboard and fiddles with the dials.
sentences.chinese: 鲍勃转身对着仪表盘，摆弄着那些旋钮。

sentences.english: The X- Ray watch collection has four dial color variations and two dial designs.
sentences.chinese: 射线腕表系列有四个表盘颜色变化和两个表盘设计。

sentences.english: The X- Ray watch collection has four dial color variations and two dial designs.
sentences.chinese: 射线腕表系列有四个表盘颜色变化和两个表盘设计。

sentences.english: A yellow light on the dashboard flashed angrily.
sentences.chinese: 仪表盘一盏黄灯闪着刺眼的光芒。

definition: balance (of a watch or clock)/balance wheel
pointer on a gauge/clock hand/cursor/(computing) pointer
phases of moon, namely: new moon 朔[shuo4], first quarter or waxing moon 上弦[shang4 xian2], full moon 望[wang4] and last quarter or waning moon 下弦[xia4 xian2]
perpetual calendar/ten thousand year calendar/Islamic calendar introduced to Yuan China by Jamal al-Din 紮馬剌丁|扎马剌丁
